synopsis.text:
Wendy, Lucy, and Erza, along with the rest of the Fairy Tail guild, find themselves in a series of whimsical and entertaining escapades in these special OVA episodes. After the Grand Magic Games conclude without a clear winner, the guild master Makarov Dreyar proposes a playful rock-paper-scissors competition between Team A and Team B to determine the ultimate victor. The stakes are high, as the losing team must comply with any request made by the winners.

In an attempt to lift Mavis's spirits, Natsu and Erza embark on a quest to find a century-old treasure buried by Mavis herself. As they delve deeper into the mystery, they uncover secrets about Fairy Tail's original members.

Lucy takes the initiative to organize a Christmas celebration for her friends in the city of Magnolia. After a day of spreading holiday cheer, the Fairy Tail members gather for a festive party filled with games and alcohol, resulting in their signature chaotic and hilarious shenanigans.

These OVA episodes are bundled with special edition volumes of the manga, offering fans a delightful extension of the beloved Fairy Tail series.
